mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tsysdept WHERE FOrgId = #{orgId} AND FFlag = 1
SELECT * FROM tsysdept WHERE FParentId = #{parentId} AND FFlag = 1
SELECT * FROM tsysdept WHERE FParentId = '7dc16e86-172c-4f96-bd16-9a0fd82d6262' AND FFlag = 1

SELECT t1.FDeptId as deptId,t1.FDeptFullName as deptFullName,t1.FDeptName as deptName FROM tsysdept t1 WHERE t1.FFlag=1 and not EXISTS( SELECT t2.* FROM serviceCatalogRelateDept t2 WHERE t2.catalogId = #{catalogId} and t1.FDeptId = t2.deptId ) and not EXISTS ( SELECT t3.FParentId FROM tsysdept t3 WHERE t3.FParentId = t1.FSourceCode )
and t1.FDeptFullName like concat('%',#{deptVo.deptFullName},'%')
and t1.FDeptName like concat('%',#{deptVo.deptName},'%')
ORDER BY t1.FDeptId desc

SELECT t1.FDeptId as deptId,t1.FDeptFullName as deptFullName,t1.FDeptName as deptName FROM tsysdept t1 WHERE t1.FFlag=1 and t1.FHrDeptLevel=3 and not EXISTS( SELECT t2.* FROM serviceCatalogRelateDept t2 WHERE t2.catalogId = 1 and t1.FDeptId = t2.deptId ) and EXISTS ( SELECT t3.FParentId FROM tsysdept t3 WHERE t3.FParentId = t1.FSourceCode )
and t1.FDeptFullName like concat('%',#{deptVo.deptFullName},'%')
and t1.FDeptName like concat('%',#{deptVo.deptName},'%')
ORDER BY t1.FDeptId desc

SELECT t1.FDeptId as deptId,t1.FDeptFullName as deptFullName,t1.FDeptName as deptName FROM tsysdept t1 WHERE t1.FFlag=1 and EXISTS( SELECT t2.* FROM serviceCatalogRelateDept t2 WHERE t2.catalogId = #{catalogId} and t1.FDeptId = t2.deptId )
